description: This wire net wraps over your pack and gear to deter thieves from slashing your pack. The padlock and locking system also allow your stuff to be secured to a post or other fixed object.Wire net folds to a convenient, compact size of 15 x 10 x 4cm.High-impact-resistant polycarbonate locking system, complete with padlock.Secures a daypack, sleeping bag, or hiking boots outside your pack. (Backpack, daypack, boots, and sleeping bag not included).Small fits packs 22–55L. Medium fits 55–85L.If you don’t know your pack volume, multiply length x width x height in centimetres of your pack. Divide that number by 1000 for the approximate volume (e.g., 30,000cm³ is a 30L pack), and choose the Pacsafe to fit that volume.
name: Pacsafe Backpack and Bag Protector
